aboutpara: I am a full-stack developer with over 4 years of experience. I am currently doing my BSc in CSE (1st year) at United International University. I started my journey when I was in 8th grade and still going. I started as a front-end developer and then started Backend development and became a full-stack developer. I love to solve problems and turn ideas into reality!

resume.tagline: Full-Stack Developer | MERN Stack Developer | JavaScript Developer
resume.description: I have 4+ years of experience in full-stack development. I have professional experience in JavaScript, ReactJs, NextJs, React Native, NodeJs, Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, and MySQL. I am experienced with tools like Docker, GitHub, AWS, Supabase, Firebase and many more.
